name: English Lessons for beginners
description: Learning English has just become easier! The Rich Morning Show is a program of animated English lessons for children and beginners.   Brilliant!  ELLE  Participation and pleasure guaranteed.  24 Heures  A major step in language learning.  20Minutes  Smart and practical.  Challenges  Our favorite!  Vocable    Rich Morning Show is a partner of LeMonde.fr and was nominated as the best e-content product representing France in the World Summit Awards, organized under the backing of the United Nations.    ..... ...... ......   The Rich Morning Show provides daily personalized English lessons for beginners. Each morning, you receive a daily lesson featuring a video followed by questions, corrections, mini-lessons, and personalized revision exercises.   * Suited to children (and adults) who are just beginning to learn English, or who already have some knowledge of the language  * With each video, a personalised selection of English exercises, both written and oral  * Fun lessons keep you motivated  * Personalised content  * Learn practical English that youll use everyday  * One million users worldwide.   The Rich Morning Show, Gymglish (http://www.gymglish.com) and Frantastique (http://www.frantastique.com) are designed, edited and developed in their entirety, both technology and pedagogy, by A9 SAS.
